about_the_game:
Andreas Kotsamanidis is the lead composer for Beloved Rapture, replicating many of the limitations and nostalgic quirks of the iconic 16-bit sound. This music style is not only highly nostalgic, but also felt most appropriate for the 16-bit visuals.

This complete original soundtrack features 47 tracks, spanning well over 2 hours!

Yasunori Mitsuda, Nobuo Uematsu, Hiroki Kikuta, Koichi Sugiyama, Koji Kondo, Eveline Novakovic, and David Wise were some of my favorites, and a profound inspiration for BR's soundtrack.
